{"id":1253843317,"question_id":2524,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1715280318,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"5 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1253843317/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Largest Positive Integer That Exists With Its Negative","memory":"44.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int findMaxK(int[] nums) {\n        Arrays.sort(nums);\n        for (int left = 0, right = nums.length-1; left < right; ) {\n            int lv = Math.abs(nums[left]);\n            int rv = Math.abs(nums[right]);\n            if (lv > rv) { // left bigger\n                left++;\n            } else if (rv > lv) { // right bigger\n                right--;\n            } else { // same size\n                return nums[left] == nums[right] ? -1 : nums[right];\n            }\n        }\n        return -1;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"largest-positive-integer-that-exists-with-its-negative","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
